ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: The Indonesian language, along with the culture and fun facts about Indonesia.
I learned the basics of Indonesian and look forward to learning more
Learnt the basics of the indonesian language
the basics in forming sentences and speaking Indonesian. also learned about the culture of Indonesia
I learned the basics of Indonesian.
Understanding of the Indonesian language and culture, how to speak the language and how to learn it best
I had a full introduction to Indonesian culture and the language. By the end of the semester, I now feel able to have basic conversations with locals if I ever visit Indonesia.
I learned about the Indonesian language and culture.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Taught very well, the structure of this language class could not be better.
very good professor and very enjoyable course but sometimes the assignments can be slightly unclear
Strengths of this course is the teacher was amazing and engaging which made it easy to learn. weakness of this course for me was that the tests that we had were hard relative to the day to day work
Communication is a weakness but teacher was very energetic

Strengths: great teacher, not stressful, engaging and fun

Weaknesses: none
The strength of the course is course material is kept interesting but there is a lack of vocabulary review in class.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes, very fun professor and content.
Yes - one of the most fun yet engaging daily courses offered at Yale.
Yes. If you need a language requirement or just want to take and easy course and learn an easy language
throughly enjoyable class
yes the teacher is amazing and funny and makes you want to go to class
YES, its a very interesting language and culture to learn about and the professor is very engaging and teaches well
I would recommend this course, I feel that I learnt a lot and did so in an engaging and enjoyable class atmosphere.
I would recommend this course. Pak Indriyo makes everything fun, interesting, and engaging.
